english.segment1: I feel You falling. Like the rain against my skin. I hear You calling. Your voice like thunder in my head
english.segment2: But now I am stalling. 'Cause I'm afraid to let You in. Come break me down with Your mercy. Come break me down again
english.segment3: I'm Yours tonight. I'm Yours if You can break me down. Break through these walls I hide behind. I'm Yours tonight. Come and break me down. Won't You break me
english.segment4: I feel it inside me. I feel You underneath my skin. These walls could not hide me. They could not keep you from coming in
english.segment5: So now here You find me. Right back to where I began. Come break me down with Your mercy. Come break me down again
english.segment6: I need Your strength to feel this weak. And I need Your touch to feel my need. And I need Your strong hands to carry me. Take me break me set me free
